Paragraph: Our objective in this study was to investigate whether the compounds induce developmental toxicity via the dermal route , which is more relevant to occupational exposure , hence better addressing human health risks .

Note: "developmental toxicity" and "occupational exposure" are not diseases in the classical sense, but they are still relevant to health risks and are often studied in the field of toxicology.
